Headline: #3 King Drive Temporary Reroute at King Drive/69th
ShortDescription: 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Drive, 69th, Anthony, King Drive due to, street blockage near King Drive/69th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Austin
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Austin due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
